entry.title: NuriaAgbasi/HMTS-dts-challenge-frontend: A simple yet professional task manager application built with React (Vite) and Node.js (Express) that allows users to create, view, update, and delete tasks. The backend uses SQLite with Prisma ORM, providing a lightweight and efficient database solution. Tailwind CSS is used for styling, ensuring a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface.
entry.content: A simple yet professional task manager application built with React (Vite) and Node.js (Express) that allows users to create, view, update, and delete tasks. The backend uses SQLite with Prisma ORM, providing a lightweight and efficient database solution. Tailwind CSS is used for styling, ensuring a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface.

entry.title: NuriaAgbasi/HMTS-dts-challenge-backend: A simple yet professional task manager application built with React (Vite) and Node.js (Express) that allows users to create, view, update, and delete tasks. The backend uses SQLite with Prisma ORM, providing a lightweight and efficient database solution. Tailwind CSS is used for styling, ensuring a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface.
entry.content: A simple yet professional task manager application built with React (Vite) and Node.js (Express) that allows users to create, view, update, and delete tasks. The backend uses SQLite with Prisma ORM, providing a lightweight and efficient database solution. Tailwind CSS is used for styling, ensuring a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface.
